common.executingActionsDescription: These actions can be executed only once the governance parameters are met

proposalStatus.startVotingTooltip: The proposal is currently in the voting phase. Community members are actively casting their votes.
proposalStatus.endVotingTooltip: Shows the end of voting period of this proposal.
proposalStatus.executionDelayTooltip: Meets the voting requirements, Queued for the on-chain execution.
proposalStatus.executionTooltip: The proposal has been approved and successfully executed through DAO Treasury
proposalStatus.defeatedTooltip: The proposal has not been approved by the XDCDAO governance

community.name: Community
community.juryDesc: A set of pre-selected well-known community leaders.
community.houseDesc: This is the group of Token Holders who have deposited their tokens into DAO Treasury.
community.masternodeDelegateeSenateDesc: The set of Master Nodes who have joined XDCDAO by delegation mechanism.
community.whyDelegationDesc: This mechanism enhances security and ensures that each Master Node's influence is accurately represented, with the flexibility for Master Nodes to change their delegatee under certain conditions.
community.howDoesHouseWorkDesc: to People’s House where empowers its members by granting voting power proportional to their token holdings, adhering to the principle of one token, one vote.
community.minAmountHouse: The minimum amount to join is
community.resignationDesc: As the People’s House, you can add fund anytime to Treasury, and request to claim your deposit back
community.unableToWithdraw: Unable to request inside voting period
community.howIsTheRoleOfJudiciaries: How is the role of Judiciaries?
community.howIsTheRoleOfJudiciariesDesc: Their primary role is to ensure that proposals align with XDCDAO's overarching goals and criteria, serving as the guardians of the ecosystem's integrity.

rules.name: Rules of Decisions
rules.desc: All below info demostrate how voting rules work.

treasury.governorAssetDesc: Value of all assets funded in governer smart contract

grant.name: Grant
grant.description: Get access to ecosystem grants for Toolings integrations and global events and hackathons.

decision-making.name: Decision-making
decision-making.description: On-chain decision making for the entire ecosystem development, no funding invloved in.
